amendment.description: To strike the provision allowing the Commission to certify a proprietary laboratory for third party testing.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4122 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 4122 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S1571, S1573-1574; text: CR S1571) To strike the provision allowing the Commission to certify a proprietary laboratory for third party testing.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4122 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
